segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I see the sink running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the basin, flooding the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she's clueless, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are spotless, yet her foot's in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly to her side, waiting to be dried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above lets in light from the tidy garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line a path, and everything looks peaceful out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the boy's on that unstable stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, and he's helping himself boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's encouraging him, her hand outstretched eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in a big fall or spill any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating how the adult misses all this happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are tied back, framing the contrast between calm outside and chaos in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are having fun, but it's risky business.
segments.speaker: PAR
